desc: The Alif Collective is a collection of high-quality Islamic wall art for home and interior decor. Each artwork represents a carefully selected verse from the Holy Qur'an. Exclusive Arabic calligraphy, high-quality Islamic Wall Art in UAE, available in frames and canvas. Fast shipping across Abu Dhabi, Dubai, and GCC.

layout.text: VERSES FROM THE HOLY QUR'AN IN STUNNING ARABIC CALLIGRAPHY
